name: XORN
description:
Entry for LD50 Extra . Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Controls - WASD - movement

Collect gems before getting defeated by greedy adventurers! Each gems fills a different stomach and each stomach grants special traits. When an adventurer catches you, you lose the contents of your stomach. If you're starving, it's game over!

There's also lava! Running into lava will also hurt you (empty all your stomachs, not just red!), and if you run into lava with an empty stomach, it's game over.

Blue gems - faster move speed  
Green gems - gem sight  
Red gems - takes damage first to protect other stomachs   

 Design, Programming, Pixel Art, Font - Harrison Dunn  
Title Art - Disco Diffusion AI
SFX - Kenney.nl, pmsfx.com  
Music -   "The Icy Cave" by John Praw & Sam Ludwig for LD50
